application.name: 蓝羽线上签款系统
application.description: 针对线下汇款的客户款项，财务根据银行录入，营销签对应客户，财务审核后直接入ERP收款单
application.author: lijingrun

manifest.install:
#银行 CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `ims_lanyu_bank` ( `id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `weid` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `bank_name` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `bank_code` varchar(255) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM AUTO_INCREMENT=14 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;
#款项表 CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `ims_lanyu_sign` ( `id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `weid` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `bank_id` int(10) NOT NULL, `amount` float(10,2) NOT NULL COMMENT '金额', `input_id` int(10) NOT NULL, `sign_id` int(10) NOT NULL COMMENT '签款业务员id', `status` int(10) NOT NULL DEFAULT '1' COMMENT '状态，1为未审核，2为已审核', `member_name` varchar(255) COMMENT '客户名称', `create_time` varchar(255) COMMENT '入账时间', `member_code` varchar(255) COMMENT '客户编码', `bank_user` varchar(255), PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM AUTO_INCREMENT=14 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;
manifest.uninstall: DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `ims_lanyu_bank`; DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `ims_lanyu_sign`;
